record.creatorSculptor: Hibbard, Elizabeth Haseltine, b. 1894; Hibbard, Frederick Cleveland, b. 1881
record.description: [Elizabeth Haseltine Hibbard created the bronze fawn atop the David Wallach Memorial Fountain which her husband Frederick Cleveland Hibbard designed. The drinking fountain includes a well in its base with water for pets and wildlife.]
record.source: Archival Photographic Files. Addenda. Mildred Mead Photographs
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Wrongly labeled Grant Park. Curling. Photographer stamp, handwritten date and caption.
